name: Cheesy Jalapeño Mashed Potatoes
description: A mash made in heaven: rich, creamy, cheesy, and a little spicy! It’s mashed potatoes like you’ve never seen them before. Instead of drowning your taters in gravy, we’re smothering them in queso. And, if you somehow have leftovers, make potato pancakes! Simply combine potatoes with a little gluten-free flour and an egg to bind everything together, form into mini pancakes, and pan fry until edges are crisp.
preparation: In a 4-Cup Prep Bowl, whisk dip mix with milk. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 3 min, whisking halfway through. Vigorously stir in cheese and butter.
Meanwhile, chop potatoes and place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover and microwave for 12 min, or until potatoes are soft. Using the Ground Meat Separator, mash potatoes.
Stir in queso dip until combined with mashed potatoes. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Bake your cheesy mashed potatoes at 375° F for 10 min—the top of your potatoes will be crispy.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavors or colors (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
